thread.section_title: Albergo del Senato - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: On point
thread.title_full: On point - Review of Albergo del Senato, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Curtis B
title: On point
text: I booked for 3 nights and asked for one of the rooms with a balcony. WOW! What a view! The Pantheon was right there close enough to touch. The hotel has been completely tastefully remodeled but due to the age of the building, the rooms tended to be just a bit small; HOWEVER, who cared! We were in the oldest part of ROME! From the front desk to the cleaning staff to the breakfast crew, every single person was kind and caring. I mean, there were chocolates on the pillows set on a card that gave the weather for the next day. They thought of everything. BOOK with these people. You'll feel spoiled.
